values: 时期；阶段；时代；时段；周期；学时；节；课时；月经；经期；句号；句点；完整句；[地质学]纪；[数学]循环小数的循环节；[物理学]周期性变化；（冰球等比赛的）一局；（体育比赛中的）比赛阶段；（艺术、文学、音乐等的）风格时期；[音]乐段；乐节；[化学]周期表的横行；[天文]恒星（或行星的）轨道周期；[医]病期；病程；周期症状；[语言学]语段；<美口>结束；终止

就是这话；就是这么回事

synonym.mean: 周期，期间；时期；月经；课时

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 定期地；周期性地；偶尔；间歇

word_mean_info__list.difference: 正式用词，侧重指以某重大事件或巨大变化为起点的新的历史时期。
常指具有显著特征或以某杰出人物命名的历史时代或时期。
书面语用词，指历史上的纪元、年代，可与epoch和age互换，侧重时期的延续性和整个历程。
最普通用词，概念广泛，时间长短不限，既可指任何一个历史时期，又可指个人或自然界的一个发展阶段。

word_group.brief_definition: 春秋时期；春秋战国时期
战国时期；战国；战国时代
时间段；时间周期；时间期限
冷却时间；冷却期；冷静期

bilingual.source: Music in the Romantic Period is usually considered to be more expressive and emotional.
bilingual.target: 浪漫时期的音乐通常被认为更具表现力和情感。

bilingual.source: The quaternary period is the most recent geological time period.
bilingual.target: 第四的地质时期是最近的地质时期。

bilingual.source: The Renaissance was an important period in European history.
bilingual.target: 文艺复兴时期是欧洲历史上的一个重要时期。

bilingual.source: He was very busy during that period.
The Romanesque period preceded the Gothic era in architectural history.
bilingual.target: 罗马式时期在建筑史上先于哥特时期。

bilingual.source: The pupal period can last several weeks.
bilingual.target: 蛹的时期可能持续数周。

bilingual.source: This period is very important to me.
bilingual.target: 这段时期对我来说非常重要。

bilingual.source: We went to school during the same period.
bilingual.target: 我们在同一个时期上学。

bilingual.source: The weather is very cold during this period.
bilingual.target: 这段时期的天气非常寒冷。

bilingual.source: His career is now in a changlong period.
bilingual.target: 他的事业现在正处于昌隆时期。

list.abstract: period，英文单词，作名词或形容词，翻译为时期，阶段，课时，经期，句号。该词来源于希腊语periodos。

yingyinNormal.en: We call this early period inflation, where, shortly after the Big Bang, the universe expanded extremely fast for a brief period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们称其为早期膨胀阶段，那是在大爆炸后，宇宙急速膨胀的短暂时期。

yingyinNormal.en: But middle class wages during that same time period have gone up by only fourteen cents.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但中产阶级的工资在这一时期仅仅增长了14分钱。

yingyinNormal.en: Steve's done an admirable job assisting me as an advisor during this, this period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为顾问，史蒂夫做了很多令人钦佩的工作，协助我度过这段，这段时期

yingyinNormal.en: One year ago, when I gave this address for the first time, it was during a very different period for our country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一年前，我第一次做这番讲话，当时我国处于完全不同的一个时期。

yingyinNormal.en: Every year there is a different theme reflecting on a period of Chinese history. And this year, it is the Silk Road.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每年的冰雪节都有不同的主题，对应中国历史上的某一时期，今年的主题是丝绸之路。

yingyinNormal.en: People don't buy papers, period, Kent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们已经有段时间不买报纸了，肯特。

yingyinNormal.en: You admitted that your period was late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说你的例假一直没来。

yingyinNormal.en: If you want something, go get it. Period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你有理想的话，就要去努力实现，就这样。

yingyinNormal.en: Two rules. Love God. Love each other. Period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 两条规则，爱上帝，互敬互爱，就这样。

yingyinNormal.en: You missed free period workout yesterday to audition for a heinous musical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你昨天为了音乐剧试镜没参加自由时间的练习。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. How do you know that? Easy. 40 weeks from the date of her last period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么知道？简单。她最后一次月经的40周后。

yingyinNormal.en: It really was, this time last year, the worst period in my professional life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 的确，去年的这个时侯是我职业生涯的低谷。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually Joey, it's the Cretasous period. Yeah but, I can pronounce Jurassic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实暴龙是白垩纪的恐龙是。是啊，但我念得出侏罗纪。

yingyinNormal.en: When was your last menstrual period? Oh. Next question. I'll put, "In progress."
yingyinNormal.zh: 你上次生理期是什么时候？转下个问题。我就写 “生理期中”。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that was the shortest honeymoon period in history. One month as a governor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这算是史上最短的新官蜜月期了做了一个月的州长

yingyinNormal.en: I called for the pairs audition, and you didn't respond. Free period is now over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我问了对唱的试镜，你没有回应，自由活动的时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: This means Jill sees the ball travel further than Jack does in the same time period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意思是，吉尔看到的球比杰克所看到的 移动得更远在同一个时间段里。

yingyinNormal.en: As long as you're in this company under my command, you're gonna obey my orders, Period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要你一直呆在这个连队里，由我指挥，你就得服从我的命令，句号。

yingyinNormal.en: Cities have been built to a size and scale not matched in any previous period in world history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 建成城市的大小和规模前无古人。

yingyinNormal.en: We plotted the paths of every plane landing at New York's three major airports in a 24-hour period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们通过各家飞机在24小时内登陆了纽约的三家主要机场。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 时间; 时期; 阶段

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 时间；时期；阶段；周期；经期；句号；句点；周期元素；完整句；期

sense_info_list.en: a portion of time in the life of a nation, civilization, characterized by the same prevalent features or conditions
sense_info_list.zh: 时间; 时期; 阶段

examination_example.sentence: It peaks in young adulthood, levels out for a <highlight>period</highlight> of time, and then generally starts to slowly decline as we age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它在成年初期达到峰值，在一段时间内趋于稳定，然后通常会随着我们年龄的增长开始慢慢下降。

examination_example.sentence: Yet it is principally during this <highlight>period</highlight> of stronger governance that CEO pay has been high and rising.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，主要且恰恰在这一加强治理的时期，首席执行官的薪酬居高不下、持续上涨。

examination_example.sentence: If you're in a <highlight>period</highlight> of change or just feeling stuck and in a rut, now may be a good time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你正处于一段改变的时期，或者只是感觉停滞不前，现在可能是一个好时机。

sense_info_list.en: a punctuation mark (.) used at the end of a sentence or an abbreviation
belonging to or characteristic of a past historical time, especially in style or design
a unit of geological time during which a system of rocks formed

word_usage.usage:
表示“阶段、时期”时：
period用于指任何时限，或指人生/国家历史的某一阶段或时代。
phase指发展或变化过程中的某一个阶段。
stage指成长或发展的某一时期，也可指某一进程、活动等中的一个阶段。
spell指某种活动、天气、疾病等持续的一段时间，通常为期较短。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

word_family.mean: n. 时间；时期；阶段；周期；经期；句号；句点；周期元素；完整句；期

examination_example.sentence: In such studies, researchers would need to follow groups of children over a long <highlight>period</highlight> of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在此类研究中，研究人员需要对儿童群体进行长期跟踪。

examination_example.sentence: Sadly, the data also showed face-to-face socializing and sports activity had declined over the <highlight>period</highlight> covered by the survey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗憾的是，数据还显示，面对面的社交和体育活动在调查期间有所下降。

sense_info_list.en: a portion of time in the life of a nation, civilization, characterized by the same prevalent features or conditions

examination_example.sentence: Travel was arduous and costly throughout the <highlight>period</highlight>, the same that produced gentlemen scientists, authors, antique experts, and patrons of the arts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在整个时期，旅行是艰苦而昂贵的，同样也产生了绅士科学家、作家、古董专家和艺术赞助人。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 时间段；时间周期；时间期限

sense_info_list.zh: 一段时间; 一段持续时间

examination_example.sentence: If you age more slowly over a longer time <highlight>period</highlight>, then you are in some sense younger for longer. But the changes go further than that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在一个较长的时期内衰老得更慢，那么从某种意义上说，你年轻的时间也更长。但变化远不止于此。

examination_example.sentence: They found that, overall, 31% of marriages ended in divorce over the <highlight>period</highlight> studied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的来说，他们发现，在研究期间，31%的婚姻以离婚告终。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. White said his team wanted to see whether living in greener urban areas had a lasting positive effect on people's sense of well-being or whether the effect also disappeared after a <highlight>period</highlight> of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: White 博士说，他的团队想看看住在绿色城市地区是否对人们的幸福感具有持久的积极影响，或者这种影响在一段时间后是否也会消失。

sense_info_list.en: a portion of time in the life of a nation; civilization; characterized by the same prevalent features or conditions

examination_example.sentence: But economist Helena Leurent says this <highlight>period</highlight> of rapid change in manufacturing is a fantastic opportunity to make the world a better place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但经济学家海伦娜·勒伦特表示，制造业快速变革的这段时期是让世界变得更美好的绝佳机会。

examination_example.sentence: In both Greece and Italy, the growth was from 26% to 32% over the same <highlight>period</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同期，希腊和意大利的增长率都从26%升至32%。

examination_example.sentence: Rents in San Jose grew 42.6 percent between 2006 and 2014, which was the largest increase in the country during that time <highlight>period</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 圣何塞的租金在2006年至2014年间增长了42.6%，这是该国在此期间的最大增幅。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a portion of time in the life of a nation, civilization, characterized by the same prevalent features or conditions

examination_example.sentence: UNESCO will provide limited insurance coverage up to USD 30,000 for the internship <highlight>period</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教科文组织将为实习生在实习期间提供最高30000美元的有限保险。

examination_example.sentence: That was the <highlight>period</highlight> of time I enjoyed most in Toronto.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是我在多伦多最开心的一段时间。

examination_example.sentence: My uncle says that he never dreams of becoming rich in a short <highlight>period</highlight> of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我叔叔说，他从来没有梦想过在短时间内变得富有。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 春秋时期；春秋战国时期
战国时期；战国；战国时代

examination_example.sentence: It's necessary for us to wear masks (口罩) in public places during the COVID-19 <highlight>period</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在新冠肺炎期间, 我们有必要在公共场所戴口罩。

examination_example.sentence: After a <highlight>period</highlight> of tests in space, this new satellite has started to work with other Beidou satellites together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过一段时间的太空试验，这颗新卫星已经开始与其他北斗卫星协同工作。

examination_example.sentence: Being lonely for long <highlight>periods</highlight> of time is not a great feeling．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长期的孤独感觉并不好。

sense_info_list.en: a portion of time in the life of a nation, civilization, characterized by the same prevalent features or conditions

examination_example.sentence: Confucius (551—479 BC) was a great thinker and teacher in the Spring and Autumn <highlight>Period</highlight> of China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孔子（公元前551-479年）是中国春秋战国时期伟大的思想家和教育家。

examination_example.sentence: During the Warring States <highlight>Period</highlight>, there was the Chongyang Festival.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 战国时期，有重阳节。

examination_example.sentence: The name of the Chongyang Festival first appeared in the Three Kingdoms <highlight>Period</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重阳节的名称最早出现在三国时期。

sense_info_list.en: a punctuation mark (.) used at the end of a sentence or an abbreviation

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 常指具有显著特征或以某杰出人物命名的历史时代或时期。
最普通用词，概念广泛，时间长短不限，既可指任何一个历史时期，又可指个人或自然界的一个发展阶段。
